Projects.title: Tickitz - Movie Booking Web App
desc: Movie Ticket Booking Platform developed as a full-featured web application with a responsive design optimized for both mobile and desktop users.
The platform includes core features such as movie listings, seat selection, and secure user authentication using Golang and PostgreSQL with JWT-based authorization.
Built with a modular and scalable frontend architecture using React.js, Tailwind CSS, React Router, and Redux Toolkit, supporting role-based access for both users and administrators.
This project demonstrates a functional end-to-end booking system, showcasing strong fullstack development capabilities from frontend to backend and database integration.

Projects.title: Solid Coffee - Coffee Shop Web App
desc: Coffee Shop Web Application developed as a full-featured platform with a responsive design optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop users.
The platform includes core features such as movie listings, seat selection, and secure user authentication using Golang and PostgreSQL with JWT-based authorization.
The application provides essential features such as product listings, shopping cart functionality, and a seamless order flow, integrated with a Golang (Gin) backend through RESTful APIs.
Built with a modular and scalable frontend architecture using React.js, React Router, and Redux Toolkit, implementing role-based access control for both users and administrators.
This project demonstrates a complete end-to-end ordering system, highlighting strong frontend engineering skills, API integration, state management, and admin dashboard development.
